timeline.bodyText: opt: generally I think it's more readable to put the primary param first, followed by any optional / nullable / less-important params
timeline.author: calbach

timeline.bodyText: nit: Do you need the request here? Should the param just be the Runtime object?
timeline.author: calbach

timeline.bodyText: opt: could combine these into a singular xor statement
timeline.author: calbach

replies.bodyText: Going to leave them separate because I have different messages for some of the cases.

timeline.bodyText: Please add a TODO somewhere around here and/or file ticket as a follow-up for updating labels, Leo ticket is https://broadworkbench.atlassian.net/browse/IA-2149
